title: MagCable - a Magnetic Cable That Changes Charging Experience
text: Receive press releases from aMagic Ltd.: By Email RSS Feeds: MagCable - a Magnetic Cable That Changes Charging Experience MagCable is a revolutionary magnetic USB cable that keeps your mobile connected easily. MagCable is live on Kickstarter now. Please check out http://kickstarter.amagic.com. Hong Kong, Hong Kong S.A.R., September 18, 2015 --( PR.com )-- aMagic has launched a new kickstarter campaign for its latest product, MagCable.MagCable is a simple solution that changes your entire charging experience.We all went through the problem with fraying cables, struggling to connect cable with mobile in the dark, and many more hassle. As simple as it can get, MagCable provides magnetic connectivity with light indicator to make your life easier.You can connect USB cable with your mobile easily via the magnetic connection.You can detach the cable by simply bending its plug.A light indicator in cable plug helps you to locate your cable in the dark easily.A dust and water proof design prevents damages at the charging socket.A charging switch on cable lets you switch between data transfer and fast charging mode easily.MagCable is here to make your life easier.MagCable is designed for both Android (Micro-USB) and iPhone (Lightning).Supported DevicesMagCable can output electric current in either a normal mode or a fast mode. It can charge a wide range of devices, including but not limited to following brands: Samsung, iPhone, Google, HTC, LG and several portable game players, power banks, cameras, etc. MagCable can be used for any devices with a Micro-USB or Lightning port.Reversible PlugMagCable provides reversible plug. It does not matter whether the cable plug is flipped or not; MagCable could be connected to a device properly. Both sides could be connected to the mobile.Instant Fast Charging Mode Switching TechnologyMagCable supports both charging process and data synchronization simultaneously. You can simply switch between modes (Fast charging / Data transfer) by a simple click on Sync Switch.Double-sided Smart Light IndicatorA light indicator not only notifies you of the charging status, but also helps you to locate your cable in the dark. A double-sided smart light indicator design will be unlocked.Double-sided USB PlugDouble-sided USB plug will be unlocked as well. It does not matter whether the USB plug is flipped or not; MagCable could be connected to USB port properly.High Quality and Powerful MagnetMagCable utilizes the highest class of magnet in the industry. A neodymium magnet provides sufficient magnetic power at a temperature as high as 200 degree Celsius .This ensures the stability of MagCable over other existing cables.Powerful Electric CurrentBy using pure copper, MagCable allows passage of up to 3A current.
